summary: Implements and trains a Graph Isomorphism Network (GIN) with an MLP aggregation layer for graph classification, offering dataset loading, partitioning, evaluation utilities, and a full training loop built on DGL and PyTorch.
business_intent: Supply a reproducible example that showcases GIN on standard graph classification benchmarks, allowing researchers and developers to benchmark, reproduce, and extend the model for bioinformatics and social network datasets.
